description: Ministry of Urban Development, Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the acquisition of immovable Properties in Kataragama for the Constructions under Kataragama Sewerage Project, in Gongala Pathana Guruthalawa for Guruthalawa Water Supply Scheme; in Okkampitiya for the Constructions Under Monaragala - Buttala Integrated Water Supply Project and in Thalalla required by Gandara Water Supply Project
